name: Snowy Adventure Alpha
description:
In this game you are a penguin who loves fish but the seals stole your fish, go save your fish

CONTROLS:

Use arrow keys to move

Press "ESC" to restart the game

Press "Q" to switch between Retro mode or HD mode (Recommended playing in Retro Mode)

WARNING:

This is the DEMO version of the game (Demo version), the game is not complete yet, just wait for the full game release...

NOTE : If you are going to play the game in full screen it is recommended to play in Retro mode, If you are not going to play in full screen it is recommended to play in HD mode ("Q" to switch between modes)

Credits:

Music : Made in Bocaceoil and Chrome Music Lab software by RHM

Artwork : Made in Pixel Studio and Pixilart software By RHM

Inspiration : Super Mario Bros. 1983

Engine : Construct 2

Format : HTML5/EXE/NW.js

Game Developer : RHM
